title: Dropping out after 1 year for foreign education
content: Does PES allow dropping out after 1 year of Bachelors degree for shifting to a foreign country for Bachelors degree as most countries require 13 years of education

comments.body: No college "allows" that without paying a hefty fine
Dropping out isn't allowed in any college as a formal method , youll be fined very heavily for leaving a seat (as far as I know)

He's trying to say that most colleges won't allow it unless they specifically have such a transfer credit policy (like RVCE).

To answer your question, no, PES does not have this. If you drop out after a year you lose all credits.
